CustomField.formula:
CASE( Type__c , 'Temperature Sensitive', IMAGE('https://d8y000001qpy0uag-dev-ed--c.develop.vf.force.com/resource/1680362396000/TemperatureSensitiveContainer', 'Temperature Sensitive Picture', 100, 120) ,
'General Purpose', IMAGE('https://d8y000001qpy0uag-dev-ed--c.develop.vf.force.com/resource/1680362495000/GeneralPurposeContainer?', 'General Purpose Picture', 100, 120) ,
'Tank',IMAGE('https://d8y000001qpy0uag-dev-ed--c.develop.vf.force.com/resource/1680362548000/TankContainer?', 'Tank Picture', 100, 120),
null)
CustomField.label: ContainerImage
